nodes.text: Dox Piter was a collection of villages in the south of the planet Onderon. The villages were located at the base of a mountain known as the Dagger. It was at Dox Piter where a legendary conflict took place between Wodnakki and the Royal Guard of Queen Lina.
Dox Piter is mentioned in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Onslaught in the codex entry 'The Dagger at Dox Piter'.
